content_parts.title: Authorization enhancements for purchasing and sales

content_parts.content:
User rights management is enhanced and simplified to improve accuracy and reduce implementation and maintenance time.

The purchasing and sales authorization processes include the following improvements:

  • Reviewed permission texts to ensure a better understanding
  • Grouping of permissions for a simplified setup
  • Automatic reference lookup management
  • Standard roles update
  • Display only the menu items that correspond to the user's rights

content_parts.title: Intacct integration: Default dimensions

content_parts.content:
On the Site page, you can assign default dimensions and attributes as needed for a site.

On the Company page, in the Default dimension rules grid, you can define the document and origin combinations that inherit the settings for that site.

Document and origin options include:

  • Manufacturing direct
  • Sales direct
  • Stock direct
  • Purchasing direct

When a direct document is created, the default dimensions are automatically assigned. You can modify on the individual document after it is created as needed.

If you modify the default dimensions on a source document, subsequent documents inherit those settings.

content_parts.title: Work order planned cost for average cost and FIFO cost components

content_parts.content: The planned material cost for a work order is calculated from the current cost of each individual component, as determined by the defined valuation method for the component. The individual component cost will therefore be the standard cost, the current average cost, or for a component valued at FIFO cost, the oldest available FIFO tier cost.

content_parts.title: Item page improvements

content_parts.content:
Main list row actions

For items, you can perform several key actions from the main list to save time, such as:

  • Duplicate
  • Delete

Additional columns for main list

You can display additional columns in the main list such as:

  • Base price
  • Currency

Additional tabs and reorganization

Tabs are reorganized to enable you to complete tasks efficiently.

A Manufacturing tab displays how an item is used within a bill of material.

On the Allergen and GHS Classification tabs, you can multi-select allergens and GHS classifications to add to an item.

Switch placement

The switches that control item management were added to the header so you can easily see which tabs are available depending on the management rules.
